Title: Computer Vision
Des2: Python, Numpy, kNN, Softmax, SVM classifier, Cross Validation

Title: Machine Learning and Real-world Data
Des2: Text Classification using ML with improvements, including Naive Bayes classifier, Cross-Validation, NLP

Title: Machine Learning

Title: Database Design Project (C++)
Des1: Buffer Pool Management System, Latch, LRU Replacement policy, Buffer Pool Manager Instance. In order to solve the concurrent problem, implement the PARALLEL Buffer Pool Manager.
Des2: C++ STL; Useful Coding Skills: Google C++ Style Guide
Des3: logger.h:Debug logging functions for EE / LOG_DEBUG ; gtest/gtest.h:Google Unit Testing

Title: Introduction to Computer Graphics
Des1: With the help of the Open Course, I have implemented a ray tracer using C++, with two kinds of cameras, orthonormal and perspective camera respectively.
Des2: In addition, several types of primitives are built, e.g. sphere, triangle, plane, triangle mesh, just to name a few.
Des4: Useful Coding Skills: Command line Argument; Using Assert(); On each .h, #progma once
